snippet.title: Replica | Trailer
snippet.description:
Replica is an interactive novel game played through a cellphone and social media.

You are given a cellphone of an unknown owner. You must look for evidence of terrorism by hacking into the cellphone owner's account, under governmental coercion. Then inspecting the cellphone usage history and social media activity records. Try this puzzling new experience in gaming.

The insane experience of peeping into someone's private life through a cellphone will transform you into the state's greatest patriot. 

Steam store : http://store.steampowered.com/app/496890
ITCH.IO store : https://indiesomi.itch.io/replica

Follow me
Twitter : @IndieSomi
Facebook : www.facebook.com/SOMIcreatesgames/
Web Page : SomiGames.com

Background Music : 
Agnus Dei: Prepare yourself by Zero Project
